summary: I HAVE 4 ORIGINAL FIRESTONE TIRES [FR680]  P215/70/R15 TIRES THAT HAVE SPLITS IN SIDE WALLS  BY TREAD AREAS, AND THEY ALSO HAVE BULGES IN SIDEWALL AREAS. ONLY 25000 MI. ON THEM. I FEEL THAT I NEED TO REPLACE THEM BEFORE WE HAVE A MAJOR BLOW OUT AND ACCIDENT BY THESE VISIBLE PROBLEMS. WITH  3 CHILDREN I CANNOT AFFORD AN ACCIDENT CAUSED BY THESE TIRES. I WILL BE KEEPING OLD TIRES . I WENT ON THE WEB SIGHT AND SAW THAT SIMILAR PROBLEMS ARE HAPPENING TO OTHER PEOPLE???   *JB
